## DataSource.detach() method

This method is called when this `DataSource` is removed from a \[\[MapView\]\].

Reimplementations of this method must invoke the definition of the super class.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
detach(mapView: MapView): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | The instance of the \[\[MapView\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
